attributes.action: help against the persecution of Hindus in Kazakhstan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The situation:

- With only one days notice Hindu homes in Kazakhstan were destroyed

- Restricted Religious freedom for Hindus

- See Hindus as a threat

- The government are breaking their own laws by destroying these homes

- Police demolished 100 Hindu homes on 21/11/2006 and 15/06/2007, making all occupants homeless

The land which is legally owned by the Hindu Community has illegally been confiscated by the Kazakhstan Government.

The land (over 100 acres) is still in the Kazakh Governments hands - this petition is to demand the British Government intervene to help return the land to rightful owners!
